<script>
        (function () {
            var errors = [];

            function send() {
                if (errors.length === 0) { return; }
                var request = window.XMLHttpRequest;
                try {
                    var xhr = new request();
                    var logurl = "/on/demandware.store/Sites-dsquared2-row-Site/en_US/Error-JsLogger";
                    var params = JSON.stringify(errors);
                    errors = [];

                    xhr.open("POST", logurl, true);
                    xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
                    xhr.setRequestHeader("x-requested-with", "XMLHttpRequest");
                    xhr.timeout = 5000;
                    xhr.send(params);
                } catch (e) {}
            }

            function getDebounceSend() {
                var timer = null;
                return function() {
                    if (timer) return;
                    timer = setTimeout(function () {
                        send();
                        timer = null;
                    }, 500);
                };
            }

            var debouncedSend = getDebounceSend();

            function log(type, message, line, column, e) {
                errors.push({
                    type: type,
                    message: message,
                    url: window.location.href,
                    line: line,
                    column: column,
                    stack: e && e.stack
                });
                debouncedSend();
            }

            window.onerror = function(message, url, line, column, e) {
                log('window.onerror', message, line, column, e);
                return false;
            };
            if (window.console) {
                var consoleError = console.error;
                console.error = function () {
                    consoleError.apply(this, arguments);
                    log('console.error', arguments[0], 'N/A', 'N/A', new Error());
                };

                var consoleWarn = console.warn;
                console.warn = function () {
                    consoleWarn.apply(this, arguments);
                    log('console.warn', arguments[0], 'N/A', 'N/A', new Error());
                };
            }
        })();
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (head-active_data.js) */
var dw = (window.dw || {});
dw.ac = {
    _analytics: null,
    _events: [],
    _category: "",
    _searchData: "",
    _anact: "",
    _anact_nohit_tag: "",
    _analytics_enabled: "true",
    _timeZone: "Europe/Rome",
    _capture: function(configs) {
        if (Object.prototype.toString.call(configs) === "[object Array]") {
            configs.forEach(captureObject);
            return;
        }
        dw.ac._events.push(configs);
    },
	capture: function() { 
		dw.ac._capture(arguments);
		// send to CQ as well:
		if (window.CQuotient) {
			window.CQuotient.trackEventsFromAC(arguments);
		}
	},
    EV_PRD_SEARCHHIT: "searchhit",
    EV_PRD_DETAIL: "detail",
    EV_PRD_RECOMMENDATION: "recommendation",
    EV_PRD_SETPRODUCT: "setproduct",
    applyContext: function(context) {
        if (typeof context === "object" && context.hasOwnProperty("category")) {
        	dw.ac._category = context.category;
        }
        if (typeof context === "object" && context.hasOwnProperty("searchData")) {
        	dw.ac._searchData = context.searchData;
        }
    },
    setDWAnalytics: function(analytics) {
        dw.ac._analytics = analytics;
    },
    eventsIsEmpty: function() {
        return 0 == dw.ac._events.length;
    }
};

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (head-cquotient.js) */
var CQuotient = window.CQuotient = {};
CQuotient.clientId = 'bdnr-dsquared2-row';
CQuotient.realm = 'BJTL';
CQuotient.siteId = 'dsquared2-row';
CQuotient.instanceType = 'prd';
CQuotient.locale = 'en_US';
CQuotient.fbPixelId = '__UNKNOWN__';
CQuotient.activities = [];
CQuotient.cqcid='';
CQuotient.cquid='';
CQuotient.cqeid='';
CQuotient.cqlid='';
CQuotient.apiHost='api.cquotient.com';
/* Turn this on to test against Staging Einstein */
/* CQuotient.useTest= true; */
CQuotient.useTest = ('true' === 'false');
CQuotient.initFromCookies = function () {
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
	  var c = ca[i];
	  while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
	  if (c.indexOf('cqcid=') == 0) {
		CQuotient.cqcid=c.substring('cqcid='.length,c.length);
	  } else if (c.indexOf('cquid=') == 0) {
		  var value = c.substring('cquid='.length,c.length);
		  if (value) {
		  	var split_value = value.split("|", 3);
		  	if (split_value.length > 0) {
			  CQuotient.cquid=split_value[0];
		  	}
		  	if (split_value.length > 1) {
			  CQuotient.cqeid=split_value[1];
		  	}
		  	if (split_value.length > 2) {
			  CQuotient.cqlid=split_value[2];
		  	}
		  }
	  }
	}
}
CQuotient.getCQCookieId = function () {
	if(window.CQuotient.cqcid == '')
		window.CQuotient.initFromCookies();
	return window.CQuotient.cqcid;
};
CQuotient.getCQUserId = function () {
	if(window.CQuotient.cquid == '')
		window.CQuotient.initFromCookies();
	return window.CQuotient.cquid;
};
CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail = function () {
	if(window.CQuotient.cqeid == '')
		window.CQuotient.initFromCookies();
	return window.CQuotient.cqeid;
};
CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin = function () {
	if(window.CQuotient.cqlid == '')
		window.CQuotient.initFromCookies();
	return window.CQuotient.cqlid;
};
CQuotient.trackEventsFromAC = function (/* Object or Array */ events) {
try {
	if (Object.prototype.toString.call(events) === "[object Array]") {
		events.forEach(_trackASingleCQEvent);
	} else {
		CQuotient._trackASingleCQEvent(events);
	}
} catch(err) {}
};
CQuotient._trackASingleCQEvent = function ( /* Object */ event) {
	if (event && event.id) {
		if (event.type === dw.ac.EV_PRD_DETAIL) {
			CQuotient.trackViewProduct( {id:'', alt_id: event.id, type: 'raw_sku'} );
		} // not handling the other dw.ac.* events currently
	}
};
CQuotient.trackViewProduct = function(/* Object */ cqParamData){
	var cq_params = {};
	cq_params.cookieId = CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.product = cqParamData.product;
	cq_params.realm = cqParamData.realm;
	cq_params.siteId = cqParamData.siteId;
	cq_params.instanceType = cqParamData.instanceType;
	cq_params.locale = CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(CQuotient.sendActivity) {
		CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewProduct', cq_params);
	} else {
		CQuotient.activities.push({activityType: 'viewProduct', parameters: cq_params});
	}
};
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

        }
    ];

    oggettiMultilingua.forEach(translations => {
        if (translations.lang === language) {
            //document.querySelectorAll('#freeship').forEach(el => el.innerHTML = translations.sales);
            document.querySelectorAll('#countdown-cta_men').forEach(el => el.innerHTML = translations.cta_men);
            document.querySelectorAll('#countdown-cta_women').forEach(el => el.innerHTML = translations.cta_women);
            document.querySelectorAll('#countdown-cta_kids').forEach(el => el.innerHTML = translations.cta_kids);
            document.querySelectorAll('.sales').forEach(el => el.innerHTML = translations.sales);
        }
    });

}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNM0332592C7159\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Dash\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M2691\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>
</section>

};

(function () {

event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNM0332592C7159\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Dash\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M1361\"\u007d");

if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

var tcInfo = JSON.parse("\u007b\"product\u005fid\"\u003a\"SNM033259207159M536\"\u002c\"product\u005fsku\"\u003anull\u002c\"product\u005fname\"\u003a\"Dash\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"product\u005fvariant\"\u003a\"M536\"\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpage\"\u003a\"https\u003a\/\/www\u002edsquared2\u002ecom\/us\/dash\u002dsneakers\/SNM033259207159M536\u002ehtml\"\u002c\"product\u005fdiscount\u005ftf\"\u003a\"0\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005fcurrentprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005foriginalprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005finstock\"\u003a\"1\"\u002c\"product\u005fbreadcrumb\u005flabel\"\u003a\u005b\"Home\"\u002c\"Men\"\u002c\"Shoes\"\u002c\"Sneakers\"\u002c\"Dash\u0020Sneakers\"\u005d\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpicture\"\u003a\"\/dw\/image\/v2\/BJTL\u005fPRD\/on\/demandware\u002estatic\/\u002d\/Sites\u002ddsquared2\u002dmaster\u002dcatalog\/default\/dw1fdf643a\/images\/SNM033259207159M536B\u002ejpg\u003fsw\u003d476\u0026sh\u003d714\u0026sm\u003dfit\u0026q\u003d65\"\u007d");
if (window.tc_vars.list_products.length < 3.0) {
window.tc_vars.list_products.push(tcInfo);
}
window.tc_vars.list_product_id.push(tcInfo.product_id);
window.tc_vars.list_product_name.push(tcInfo.product_name);
window.tc_vars.list_product_discount_tf.push(tcInfo.product_discount_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_originalprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_originalprice_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_currentprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_currentprice_tf);

window.tc_vars.list_product_instock.push(tcInfo.product_instock);
window.tc_vars.list_product_breadcrumb_label.push(tcInfo.product_breadcrumb_label);
})();
</script>

ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNM033259207159\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Dash\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M536\"\u007d");

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}

})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNM033259207159\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Dash\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");

if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {

event: 'pageLoad',

currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNM033259207159\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Dash\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M063\"\u007d");

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

var tcInfo = JSON.parse("\u007b\"product\u005fid\"\u003a\"SNM0332592C7159M2084\"\u002c\"product\u005fsku\"\u003anull\u002c\"product\u005fname\"\u003a\"Dash\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"product\u005fvariant\"\u003a\"M2084\"\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpage\"\u003a\"https\u003a\/\/www\u002edsquared2\u002ecom\/us\/dash\u002dsneakers\/SNM0332592C7159M2084\u002ehtml\"\u002c\"product\u005fdiscount\u005ftf\"\u003a\"0\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005fcurrentprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005foriginalprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005finstock\"\u003a\"1\"\u002c\"product\u005fbreadcrumb\u005flabel\"\u003a\u005b\"Home\"\u002c\"Men\"\u002c\"Shoes\"\u002c\"Sneakers\"\u002c\"Dash\u0020Sneakers\"\u005d\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpicture\"\u003a\"\/dw\/image\/v2\/BJTL\u005fPRD\/on\/demandware\u002estatic\/\u002d\/Sites\u002ddsquared2\u002dmaster\u002dcatalog\/default\/dw3b9e9085\/images\/SNM0332592C7159M2084B\u002ejpg\u003fsw\u003d476\u0026sh\u003d714\u0026sm\u003dfit\u0026q\u003d65\"\u007d");
if (window.tc_vars.list_products.length < 3.0) {
window.tc_vars.list_products.push(tcInfo);
}
window.tc_vars.list_product_id.push(tcInfo.product_id);
window.tc_vars.list_product_name.push(tcInfo.product_name);
window.tc_vars.list_product_discount_tf.push(tcInfo.product_discount_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_originalprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_originalprice_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_currentprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_currentprice_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_url_page.push(tcInfo.product_url_page);

window.tc_vars.list_product_instock.push(tcInfo.product_instock);
window.tc_vars.list_product_breadcrumb_label.push(tcInfo.product_breadcrumb_label);
})();
</script>

currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}

})();

(function () {

event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNM033259207159\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Dash\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"5057\"\u007d");

if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {

event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNM034211100001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"New\u0020Jersey\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"515\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M2044\"\u007d");

if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

var tcInfo = JSON.parse("\u007b\"product\u005fid\"\u003a\"SNM034211100001M2649\"\u002c\"product\u005fsku\"\u003anull\u002c\"product\u005fname\"\u003a\"New\u0020Jersey\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"product\u005fvariant\"\u003a\"M2649\"\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpage\"\u003a\"https\u003a\/\/www\u002edsquared2\u002ecom\/us\/new\u002djersey\u002dsneakers\/SNM034211100001M2649\u002ehtml\"\u002c\"product\u005fdiscount\u005ftf\"\u003a\"0\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005fcurrentprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"515\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005foriginalprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"515\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005finstock\"\u003a\"1\"\u002c\"product\u005fbreadcrumb\u005flabel\"\u003a\u005b\"Home\"\u002c\"Men\"\u002c\"Shoes\"\u002c\"Sneakers\"\u002c\"New\u0020Jersey\u0020Sneakers\"\u005d\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpicture\"\u003a\"\/dw\/image\/v2\/BJTL\u005fPRD\/on\/demandware\u002estatic\/\u002d\/Sites\u002ddsquared2\u002dmaster\u002dcatalog\/default\/dw7b9ead20\/images\/SNM034211100001M2649S\u002ejpg\u003fsw\u003d476\u0026sh\u003d714\u0026sm\u003dfit\u0026q\u003d65\"\u007d");
if (window.tc_vars.list_products.length < 3.0) {
window.tc_vars.list_products.push(tcInfo);
}
window.tc_vars.list_product_id.push(tcInfo.product_id);
window.tc_vars.list_product_name.push(tcInfo.product_name);
window.tc_vars.list_product_discount_tf.push(tcInfo.product_discount_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_originalprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_originalprice_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_currentprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_currentprice_tf);

window.tc_vars.list_product_instock.push(tcInfo.product_instock);
window.tc_vars.list_product_breadcrumb_label.push(tcInfo.product_breadcrumb_label);
})();
</script>

(function () {

event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNM034211100001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"New\u0020Jersey\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"515\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M072\"\u007d");

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

        Spiker Sneakers
    </a>

window.tc_vars.list_product_url_picture.push(tcInfo.product_url_picture);
window.tc_vars.list_product_instock.push(tcInfo.product_instock);
window.tc_vars.list_product_breadcrumb_label.push(tcInfo.product_breadcrumb_label);
})();
</script><script>
(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNM017201500409\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Bumper\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"550\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

    <h3 class="b-product_tile-title">

        Canadian Sneakers
    </a>

<div class="b-product_tile-content">
    

    <h3 class="b-product_tile-title">
    <a role="none" tabindex="-1" href="/us/berlin-sneakers/SNM029325406367M2713.html#cgid=men-shoes" class="b-product_tile-link" data-ref="tileTitleLink" data-event-click="onProductLinkClick" data-pid="SNM029325406367M2713" data-analytics="{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;SNM029325406367&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Berlin Sneakers&quot;,&quot;category&quot;:&quot;men-shoes-sneakers&quot;,&quot;brand&quot;:&quot;D2&quot;,&quot;price&quot;:&quot;605.00&quot;,&quot;variant&quot;:&quot;M2713&quot;}" data-tc-analytics="{&quot;product_id&quot;:&quot;SNM029325406367M2713&quot;,&quot;product_sku&quot;:null,&quot;product_name&quot;:&quot;Berlin Sneakers&quot;,&quot;product_variant&quot;:&quot;M2713&quot;,&quot;product_url_page&quot;:&quot;https://www.dsquared2.com/us/berlin-sneakers/SNM029325406367M2713.html&quot;,&quot;product_discount_tf&quot;:&quot;0.00&quot;,&quot;product_currentprice_tf&quot;:&quot;605.00&quot;,&quot;product_originalprice_tf&quot;:&quot;605.00&quot;,&quot;product_instock&quot;:&quot;1&quot;,&quot;product_breadcrumb_label&quot;:[&quot;Home&quot;,&quot;Men&quot;,&quot;Shoes&quot;,&quot;Sneakers&quot;,&quot;Berlin Sneakers&quot;],&quot;product_url_picture&quot;:&quot;/dw/image/v2/BJTL_PRD/on/demandware.static/-/Sites-dsquared2-master-catalog/default/dw073daf0d/images/SNM029325406367M2713B.jpg?sw=476&amp;sh=714&amp;sm=fit&amp;q=65&quot;}" data-tau="product_name">
        Berlin Sneakers
    </a>
</h3>

	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';

	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "en";

	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);

	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'SNM028008106244M436',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'men-shoes-sneakers';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"men-shoes-sneakers\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'best-matches';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BJTL";
	cq_params.siteId = "dsquared2-row";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "en";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}

</script><div class="l-plp_grid-tiles" data-history-url="https://www.dsquared2.com/us/men/shoes/sneakers?sz=24&amp;start=60">

    <h3 class="b-product_tile-title">

    <h3 class="b-product_tile-title">

try {
    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'SNM035735503298M2168',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'men-shoes-sneakers';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"men-shoes-sneakers\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'best-matches';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BJTL";
	cq_params.siteId = "dsquared2-row";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "en";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script><script>//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"men-shoes-sneakers\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'best-matches';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = '5d238550-c776-406d-ace5-c12747ec2e43';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'en';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "men-shoes-sneakers", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNM035735503298\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Wave\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"775\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M2168\"\u007d");

if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"BOM003012900001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Vintage\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dboots\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"1290\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"5090\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

var tcInfo = JSON.parse("\u007b\"product\u005fid\"\u003a\"BOM0011129000015061\"\u002c\"product\u005fsku\"\u003anull\u002c\"product\u005fname\"\u003a\"Vintage\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"product\u005fvariant\"\u003a\"5061\"\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpage\"\u003a\"https\u003a\/\/www\u002edsquared2\u002ecom\/us\/vintage\u002dboots\/BOM0011129000015061\u002ehtml\"\u002c\"product\u005fdiscount\u005ftf\"\u003a\"0\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005fcurrentprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"1540\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005foriginalprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"1540\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005finstock\"\u003a\"1\"\u002c\"product\u005fbreadcrumb\u005flabel\"\u003a\u005b\"Home\"\u002c\"Men\"\u002c\"Shoes\"\u002c\"Boots\"\u002c\"Vintage\u0020Boots\"\u005d\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpicture\"\u003a\"\/dw\/image\/v2\/BJTL\u005fPRD\/on\/demandware\u002estatic\/\u002d\/Sites\u002ddsquared2\u002dmaster\u002dcatalog\/default\/dw27a32f52\/images\/BOM0011129000015061S\u002ejpg\u003fsw\u003d476\u0026sh\u003d714\u0026sm\u003dfit\u0026q\u003d65\"\u007d");
if (window.tc_vars.list_products.length < 3.0) {
window.tc_vars.list_products.push(tcInfo);
}
window.tc_vars.list_product_id.push(tcInfo.product_id);
window.tc_vars.list_product_name.push(tcInfo.product_name);
window.tc_vars.list_product_discount_tf.push(tcInfo.product_discount_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_originalprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_originalprice_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_currentprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_currentprice_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_url_page.push(tcInfo.product_url_page);
window.tc_vars.list_product_url_picture.push(tcInfo.product_url_picture);
window.tc_vars.list_product_instock.push(tcInfo.product_instock);
window.tc_vars.list_product_breadcrumb_label.push(tcInfo.product_breadcrumb_label);
})();
</script>

(function () {

event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"BOM001112900001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Vintage\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dboots\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"1540\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"5061\"\u007d");

if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {

event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ABM013301500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Be\u0020Icon\u0020Combat\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dboots\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"880\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");

if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ABM013518900001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Vintage\u0020Leather\u0020Ankle\u0020Boot\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dboots\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"1135\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>
</section>

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ABM013616802049\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Tank\u0020Combat\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dboots\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"845\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

};

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}

})();

(function () {

event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ABM012312906751\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Canadian\u0020Ankle\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"1095\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M2799\"\u007d");

if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ABM012312900001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Canadian\u0020Ankle\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"1095\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ABM010401501226\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Urban\u0020Hiking\u0020Ankle\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"root\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"1215\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}

})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ABM040101500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Pierre\u0020Ankle\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dboots\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"1230\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

}

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',

currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"LUM003024900001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Bobo\u0020Lace\u0020Ups\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"root\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"595\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"4066\"\u007d");

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

<script type="text/javascript">
(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"LUM009124900001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"D2\u0020Classic\u0020Derby\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dlaced\u002dshoes\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"775\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"LOM003425102624\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Beau\u0020Loafers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dloafers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"775\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M2924\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>
</section>

event: 'pageLoad',

currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"LOM003425102624\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Beau\u0020Loafers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dloafers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"775\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M2925\"\u007d");

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {

event: 'pageLoad',

currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"LOM003425102624\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Beau\u0020Loafers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dloafers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"775\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"5080\"\u007d");

if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"LOM003124904969\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Beau\u0020Leather\u0020Loafer\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dloafers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"775\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"LOM002410900001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Ubaldo\u0020Loafers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"775\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

var tcInfo = JSON.parse("\u007b\"product\u005fid\"\u003a\"LOM0024109026402124\"\u002c\"product\u005fsku\"\u003anull\u002c\"product\u005fname\"\u003a\"Ubaldo\u0020Loafers\"\u002c\"product\u005fvariant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpage\"\u003a\"https\u003a\/\/www\u002edsquared2\u002ecom\/us\/ubaldo\u002dloafers\/LOM0024109026402124\u002ehtml\"\u002c\"product\u005fdiscount\u005ftf\"\u003a\"0\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005fcurrentprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"910\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005foriginalprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"910\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005finstock\"\u003a\"1\"\u002c\"product\u005fbreadcrumb\u005flabel\"\u003a\u005b\"Home\"\u002c\"Dsquared2\u0020Storefront\u0020Catalog\"\u002c\"Ubaldo\u0020Loafers\"\u005d\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpicture\"\u003a\"\/dw\/image\/v2\/BJTL\u005fPRD\/on\/demandware\u002estatic\/\u002d\/Sites\u002ddsquared2\u002dmaster\u002dcatalog\/default\/dw904bf1e5\/images\/LOM0024109026402124B\u002ejpg\u003fsw\u003d476\u0026sh\u003d714\u0026sm\u003dfit\u0026q\u003d65\"\u007d");
if (window.tc_vars.list_products.length < 3.0) {
window.tc_vars.list_products.push(tcInfo);
}
window.tc_vars.list_product_id.push(tcInfo.product_id);
window.tc_vars.list_product_name.push(tcInfo.product_name);
window.tc_vars.list_product_discount_tf.push(tcInfo.product_discount_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_originalprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_originalprice_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_currentprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_currentprice_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_url_page.push(tcInfo.product_url_page);
window.tc_vars.list_product_url_picture.push(tcInfo.product_url_picture);
window.tc_vars.list_product_instock.push(tcInfo.product_instock);
window.tc_vars.list_product_breadcrumb_label.push(tcInfo.product_breadcrumb_label);
})();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"LOM002410902640\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Ubaldo\u0020Loafers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"root\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"910\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

(function () {

event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ESM001810100001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Hola\u0020Lace\u002dUp\u0020Espadrilles\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"3096\"\u007d");

if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

<script type="text/javascript">
(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ESM001800300533\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Hola\u0020Lace\u002dUp\u0020Espadrilles\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dslides\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"4065\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"FSM007616501805\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Sport\u0020Tape\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dsandals\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"585\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"FSM007816507409\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Wave\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dsandals\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"645\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M2930\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"men-shoes-slides\"}]';

		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "men-shoes-slides", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewProduct-active_data.js) */
dw.ac._capture({id: "ESM001710107279M063", type: "searchhit"});
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

<h3 class="b-product_tile-title">
<a role="none" tabindex="-1" href="/us/d2-pop-80s-flat-espadrilles/ESM001710107279M063.html#cgid=men-shoes" class="b-product_tile-link" data-ref="tileTitleLink" data-event-click="onProductLinkClick" data-pid="ESM001710107279M063" data-analytics="{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;ESM001710107279&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;D2 Pop 80's Flat Espadrilles&quot;,&quot;category&quot;:&quot;men-shoes-slides&quot;,&quot;brand&quot;:&quot;D2&quot;,&quot;price&quot;:&quot;460.00&quot;,&quot;variant&quot;:&quot;M063&quot;}" data-tc-analytics="{&quot;product_id&quot;:&quot;ESM001710107279M063&quot;,&quot;product_sku&quot;:null,&quot;product_name&quot;:&quot;D2 Pop 80's Flat Espadrilles&quot;,&quot;product_variant&quot;:&quot;M063&quot;,&quot;product_url_page&quot;:&quot;https://www.dsquared2.com/us/d2-pop-80s-flat-espadrilles/ESM001710107279M063.html&quot;,&quot;product_discount_tf&quot;:&quot;0.00&quot;,&quot;product_currentprice_tf&quot;:&quot;460.00&quot;,&quot;product_originalprice_tf&quot;:&quot;460.00&quot;,&quot;product_instock&quot;:&quot;1&quot;,&quot;product_breadcrumb_label&quot;:[&quot;Home&quot;,&quot;Men&quot;,&quot;Shoes&quot;,&quot;Sandals &amp; Slides&quot;,&quot;D2 Pop 80's Flat Espadrilles&quot;],&quot;product_url_picture&quot;:&quot;/dw/image/v2/BJTL_PRD/on/demandware.static/-/Sites-dsquared2-master-catalog/default/dwcf1f1159/images/ESM001710107279M063B.jpg?sw=476&amp;sh=714&amp;sm=fit&amp;q=65&quot;}" data-tau="product_name">
D2 Pop 80's Flat Espadrilles
</a>

currencyCode: 'USD',

}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ESM001710107279\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"D2\u0020Pop\u002080\u0027s\u0020Flat\u0020Espadrilles\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dslides\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M063\"\u007d");

if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);

})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"FFM002517200001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Canadian\u0020Leaf\u0020Slides\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dslides\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"385\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

<script type="text/javascript">
(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"FFM002517200001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Canadian\u0020Leaf\u0020Slides\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dslides\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"385\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"4065\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

}
};

}

}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"FSM007401500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Dsq2\u0020Leather\u0020Flip\u0020Flop\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dslides\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>
</section>

currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"FSM007401500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Dsq2\u0020Flip\u0020Flops\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dslides\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"5081\"\u007d");

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}

})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"FFM002317205573\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Icon\u0020Splash\u0020Slides\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dslides\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"325\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"FFM000117205573\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Icon\u0020Splash\u0020Flip\u0020Flops\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"men\u002dshoes\u002dslides\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"180\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>
</section>
</div>

<div class="l-plp_grid-tiles" data-history-url="https://www.dsquared2.com/us/men/shoes/sandals-slides?sz=24&amp;start=12">

    <h3 class="b-product_tile-title">
    <a role="none" tabindex="-1" href="/us/dsquared2-logo-flip-flops/FFM0001172000012124.html#cgid=men-shoes" class="b-product_tile-link" data-ref="tileTitleLink" data-event-click="onProductLinkClick" data-pid="FFM0001172000012124" data-analytics="{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;FFM000117200001&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Dsquared2 Logo Flip Flops&quot;,&quot;category&quot;:&quot;men-shoes-slides&quot;,&quot;brand&quot;:&quot;D2&quot;,&quot;price&quot;:&quot;195.00&quot;,&quot;variant&quot;:&quot;2124&quot;}" data-tc-analytics="{&quot;product_id&quot;:&quot;FFM0001172000012124&quot;,&quot;product_sku&quot;:null,&quot;product_name&quot;:&quot;Dsquared2 Logo Flip Flops&quot;,&quot;product_variant&quot;:&quot;2124&quot;,&quot;product_url_page&quot;:&quot;https://www.dsquared2.com/us/dsquared2-logo-flip-flops/FFM0001172000012124.html&quot;,&quot;product_discount_tf&quot;:&quot;0.00&quot;,&quot;product_currentprice_tf&quot;:&quot;195.00&quot;,&quot;product_originalprice_tf&quot;:&quot;195.00&quot;,&quot;product_instock&quot;:&quot;1&quot;,&quot;product_breadcrumb_label&quot;:[&quot;Home&quot;,&quot;Men&quot;,&quot;Shoes&quot;,&quot;Sandals &amp; Slides&quot;,&quot;Dsquared2 Logo Flip Flops&quot;],&quot;product_url_picture&quot;:&quot;/dw/image/v2/BJTL_PRD/on/demandware.static/-/Sites-dsquared2-master-catalog/default/dwd8166d95/images/FFM0001172000012124B.jpg?sw=476&amp;sh=714&amp;sm=fit&amp;q=65&quot;}" data-tau="product_name">
        Dsquared2 Logo Flip Flops
    </a>
</h3>

<div class="b-footer_nav" data-widget.sm="accordion" data-allow-toggle="true" data-allow-multiple="false" data-tau="footer_navigation" data-initialized="1">
<section aria-label="Account" data-widget.sm="accordionItem" data-widget-event-closeallitems.sm="closeItems" data-widget-event-accordionitemupdate.sm="updateFocusedItem" data-tau="footer_navigation_column" class="b-footer_nav-column" data-initialized="1">
<h2 class="b-footer_nav-title">
<button id="footer-account-btn" data-ref="accordionItemBtn" data-event-keydown.sm="handleKeydown" data-event-click.prevent.sm="togglePanel" data-event-focus.sm="handleFocus" class="b-footer_nav-button" type="button" data-tau="footer_navigation_button">
<span>Account</span>
<span class="b-icon_chevron"></span>
</button>
<span class="b-footer_nav-heading" data-tau="footer_navigation_heading">
Account
</span>
</h2>
<div id="footer-account" data-ref="accordionItemPanel" class="b-footer_nav-content">

<script>
    zE('webWidget:on', 'chat:departmentStatus', function (dept) {
        if (dept.name === 'DSQUARED2 chat EST' && dept.status === 'online') {
            zE('webWidget', 'updateSettings', {
                webWidget: {
                    chat: {
                        departments: { enabled: [''], select: 'DSQUARED2 chat EST' },
                        suppress: false,
                    },
                },
            });
        } else if (dept.name === 'DSQUARED2 chat EST' && dept.status !== 'online') {
            zE('webWidget', 'updateSettings', {
                webWidget: {
                    chat: { suppress: true },
                },
            });
        }
    });
</script>

                >
                    <p>Are you sure you want to remove this item?</p>
                    <p>
                        <strong>{{productName}}</strong>
                    </p>
                </div>
                <div class="b-dialog-footer m-actions">
                    
                        <button
                            type="button"
                            class="b-button m-outline"
                            data-event-click.prevent="alternativeConfirm"
                            data-dismiss="modal"
                            data-tau="remove_item_confirmation_moveToWishList"
                        >
                            Move to wish list
                        </button>
                    
                    <button
                        type="button"
                        class="b-button"
                        data-dismiss="modal"
                        data-event-click.prevent="confirm"
                        data-ref="lastFocusElement"
                        data-tau="remove_item_confirmation_confirm"
                    >
                        Remove
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </script>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="b-global_alerts m-visually_hidden" data-widget="globalAlerts" data-tau="global_alerts" data-global-alerts="{
        &quot;error500&quot;: &quot;Unexpected error occurred. Please try later&quot;
    }" data-initialized="1">
<div data-ref="item" class="b-global_alerts-item" role="alert" data-event-mouseover="pauseAlert" data-event-mouseout="resumeAlert" data-tau="global_alerts_item" hidden="hidden"></div>
</div>

This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.

You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work.
